name: A Lot Of Asteroids
description:
Retro Asteroids just got a whole lot more fun. A Lot Of Asteroids comes from the game developer DuckBear.

CONTROLS

A Lot Of Asteroids uses Xbox controllers only (other controllers might have messed up controls). 

Use the left stick to rotate and push it into the controller to go forward (or use LB to move forward and the left stick to rotate around) and the Left Trigger or Right Trigger to shoot. 

Use the D-Pad to navigate the menus.

8 GAMEMODES

  • ASTEROIDS
  • VERSUS'
  • BATTLE
  • PROTECT
  • DODGE
  • RACE
  • SOCCER
  • LINES
